title: European maritime expansion and direct trade

content.question: Which of the following was a major motivation for European maritime expansion starting in the fifteenth century?

choices.label: The desire to trade directly with Africans and Asians
The need for suitable land to establish settler colonies

content.answer: The desire to trade directly with Africans and Asians

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
